Overview  Package  Class  Use  Tree  Deprecated  Index  Help 
 PREV   NEXT FRAMES    NO FRAMES    

Identity Mixer Library 2.3.2

Packages
com.ibm.zrl.credsystem Package contains fundamential functionality to use the Idemix anonymous credential system.
com.ibm.zrl.credsystem.utils Package contains classes that extend several classes from the Idemix anonymous credential system.
com.ibm.zrl.idmx.dm This package contains the data model abstractions appearing in the various protocol roles such as credentials, attributes, or commitments.
com.ibm.zrl.idmx.dm.structure This package contains the structural information about some of the data model abstractions.
com.ibm.zrl.idmx.issuance This package contains classes for issuing new credentials.
com.ibm.zrl.idmx.issuance.update This package contains classes implementing the update functionality, which is an extension to the issuing protocol that can be run non-interactively.
com.ibm.zrl.idmx.key This package contains the code to implement the Idemix key support.
com.ibm.zrl.idmx.showproof This package contains the code to implement the Idemix proving protocol.
com.ibm.zrl.idmx.showproof.ip This package contains the code to implement the inequality proofs.
com.ibm.zrl.idmx.showproof.pe This package contains the code to implement Idemix proving protocol for prime encoded attributes.
com.ibm.zrl.idmx.showproof.predicates This package contains all the predicates that may appear in proof specifications.
com.ibm.zrl.idmx.showproof.sval Each sub-proof outputs s-values, which are described by the classes in this package.
com.ibm.zrl.idmx.utils This package contains various utilities, such as the parser and the serializer, used throughout the Idemix library.
com.ibm.zrl.idmx.utils.perf This package contains various performance enhancements used in the Idemix crypto lib.
com.ibm.zrl.idmx.ve Package containing all code to verifiably encrypt a message and to decrypt the ciphertext.
